title: Step2 Floor to Door Basketball Set
description: The Floor to Door Basketball Set by Step2 is fun for sports lovers of all ages! Toddlers can start shooting hoops when the basketball set is on the ground. As kids grow, they can improve their jump shot by placing this sports toy on the door. The Floor to Door Basketball Set folds flat when it's not in use, making it the ideal indoor sports toy. Also, this mini basketball set will be tons of fun in a dorm room for teens during study breaks and in the office during lunch breaks. If you and your kids love the game of basketball, then you will love this sports set.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description:
The Floor to Door Basketball Set by Step2 is fun for sports lovers of all ages! Toddlers can start shooting hoops when the basketball set is on the ground. As kids grow, they can improve their jump shot by placing this sports toy on the door. The Floor to Door Basketball Set folds flat when it's not in use, making it the ideal indoor sports toy. Also, this mini basketball set will be tons of fun in a dorm room for teens during study breaks and in the office during lunch breaks. If you and your kids love the game of basketball, then you will love this sports set. 

Learn more at: http://www.step2.com/p/Floor-to-Door-Basketball

transcripts: From tod to teen and beyond the floor to door  basketball set is for all ages. These hoops really do grow with your child, young toddlers will enjoy discovering the excitement of basketball from an early age. Start off with the basketball hoop set up on the floor encouraging crawlers and toddlers to start dunking this sturdy back board with real woven net features a return that below to bounce the ball back to your little star player after making a shot. Hang the set on the back of the door with the sturdy door hooks and instantly elevate your indoor game it folds flat for storage after the winning point has been made. The two include basketballs can be stored in the net when your players are in the locker room. The floor to door basketball set is made from strong durable materials that stand up to daily play from your toddler to your teen making shots from his bed or from your office chair to the back of the door. From two to ninety-two the floor to door basketball by step 2.
